posts.title: Daily Homework/Course Design/Code Tutoring for International Students
posts.text: Personal Introduction (Updated in 2024)Hi, readers, Iâ€™m glad you found a treasure blogger like meğŸ¤—! I graduated from Tsinghua University (Chinaâ€™s top university) for my bachelorâ€™s and masterâ€™s degrees, and studied for my doctorate at Ohio State University. I am the founder of the Worry-Free Study Abroad Studio. I have conducted in-depth research in the fields of AI (reinforcement learning/deep learning/machine learning), operating systems, and network security. I have won the highest championship in the finals of competitions such as Alibaba Tianchi, Kaggle, and international security competitions such as Geekpwn/Hitcon/0CTF. I have worked for ByteDance, Kuaishou, and Microsoft Research Asia as an algorithm engineer with an annual salary of up to 800,000 yuan. I have nine years of experience in tutoring overseas students. â¡ï¸ My Githubï¼šSaferman â¡ï¸ Counseling Casesï¼šclick me â¡ï¸ Feedbackï¼šclick me Why to do this?There are too many intermediaries on the market, and the commission rate is very highğŸ’”, which wastes more money for students and cannot guarantee the qualityâ¤ï¸. I am passionate about technology, and tutoring you will allow me to review this knowledge frequently. Solving challenging problems will also stimulate my strong desire to explore. At the same time, the compensation will be used to reduce the pressure of my mortgage in Beijing. To ensure quality, I promise you: Quality assurance: scoring points must be done, 100%ğŸ’¯ guaranteed originality, and no integrity principles are violated Price advantage: the cost of any assignments and exams is absolutely lower than the cost of market intermediary writing agencies, and we will not become an intermediary agency Programming style: It can meet the Google open source project style, or imitate your coding style according to your requirements If you cooperate for a long time, you can ensure that your code habits and styles are consistent for each assignment, imitate your knowledge level and coding habits For interviews or exams, please discuss the time with me in advance, I will be fully prepared, and help you control your scores if necessary Service contentsStudents or office workers around the world can contact me. The services include essays, reports, assignments, homework, projects, labs, finals and so on. Basic mathematics in the computer field, AI algorithm mathematical theory, financial computers, and quantitative investment models are also within the scope of service. The specific list is as followsï¼š AI big models, machine learning, deep learning, reinforcement learning Computer network architecture, network protocols, Linux/Windows system kernel, driver-level development Front-end and back-end development, Chrome plug-in development, APP development Cloud native security, virtualized service security, mobile security, web security, binary security, reverse engineering and cracking, risk control analysis Electronic circuits, signals and systems, probability theory, calculus, linear algebra, mathematical analysis, random processes Raspberry Pi, UNO, embedded devices (using C/C++ or Python) Contact usIt is strongly recommended to contact me via WeChat or twitter, and please state your intention. My WeChat QR code is as follows: My twitter: https://x.com/Saferman2 We promise that you will get the mosty cost-effective tutoringğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€ğŸ˜€
